data.eml:eml: Taxonomic revision of the genus Glypthelmins Stafford, 1905 (Platyhelminthes: Digenea: Plagiorchiida), parasites of anurans in the Americas

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article León, Pérez-Ponce De (2008): Taxonomic revision of the genus Glypthelmins Stafford, 1905 (Platyhelminthes: Digenea: Plagiorchiida), parasites of anurans in the Americas. Zootaxa 1882: 1-45, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.184219
